conbody.p: This document introduces you to the JPEG Exif Plug-in library. It is intended for application developers and device creators who are interested in accessing Exif metadata in JPEG and TIFF images.

section.title: Purpose
section.p: JPEG Exif Plug-in provides a simplified mechanism for accessing the Exif metadata tags in JPEG images.
The DLL that provides the functionality and the library to which your code must link is identified below.

entry.p: A simplified mechanism for accessing the Exif metadata.

section.title: Architectural Relationship
section.p: JPEG Exif Plug-in is a member of the Imaging Framework component. It is used by several image framework libraries, including:

li.p: Image Display - CImageDisplay Handles the image decoding operation, providing scope for accessing Exif metadata on a read-only basis.
Image Transformation - CImageTransform Handles image transform operations such as image resizing and rotation.
Exif Utility - Provides Exif metadata access through MExifMetadataWriter and MExifMetadataReader.

section.title: Description
section.p: JPEG Exif Plug-in provides access to metadata in JPEG images. The complete list is available from the Exif web site.

section.title: Key JPEG Exif Plug-in Classes
section.p: JPEG Exif Plug-in allows you to read Exif metadata tags from and write to JPEG images.

li.p: TExifReaderUtility reads several pre-defined tags from a JPEG image.
TExifWriterUtility writes several pre-defined tags to a JPEG image.

section.title: Using JPEG Exif Plug-in
section.p: JPEG Exif Plug-in is used for:

li.p: Reading Exif metadata from JPEG images with the pre-defined Exif tag getter functions.
Writing Exif Metadata tags to JPEG images with the pre-defined Exif tag setter functions.
